description:
Serving innocent accident victims and their families throughout Pasco County and beyond from their office in Wesley Chapel, Florida, the attorneys at the Distasio Law Firm PA are fully prepared to do whatever they can to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcomes you expect and deserve for your legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Catastrophic bodily injury
  • Medical malpractice
  • Pharmacy malpractice
  • Car accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Premises liability
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Wrongful death

Established in 2006 in Tampa, the law firm has served the residents of the greater Tampa Bay region for more than 14 years, and they have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for individuals and families suffering needlessly through no fault of their own. The law firm's founder, attorney Scott Distasio, holds his board certification in trial law from The Florida Bar. Additionally, he has received "Superb" client ratings on Avvo, as well as numerous top rankings and endorsements from his peers.

Today, Mr. Distasio leads a team of some of the best and brightest minds in the profession to offer you the best chance of obtaining the maximum amount of compensation you need and the justice you deserve.

To find out more about how they can best assist you and your family during this difficult and uncertain time in your life, you can contact the Distasio Law Firm PA to schedule a free initial consultation. They also currently offer virtual consultations so that you do not have to further risk your health and safety to speak with them.
